sqlMap.sql: BATCH_OID, O180FILENAME, LINENUM, RELATION_AGENT, SORT_NO, RELATE_ID, NAMES, IS_LEGAL, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, NATIONALITY, OCCUPATION, OCCUPATIONNAME, LISTED_COMPANY, ISSUE_SHARES, ICREATE, DCREATE
sqlMap.select:
select
from FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN where BATCH_OID = #batchOid:DECIMAL# and O180FILENAME = #o180filename:VARCHAR# and LINENUM = #linenum:DECIMAL# and RELATION_AGENT = #relationAgent:VARCHAR# and SORT_NO = #sortNo:VARCHAR#

select
from FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN
BATCH_OID = #batchOid#
O180FILENAME = #o180filename#
RELATE_ID IN #relateIdList[]#

select RELATE_ID, O180FILENAME, LINENUM from ( select DISTINCT RELATE_ID||RTRIM(NAMES,' ') as NAMES, RELATE_ID, O180FILENAME, LINENUM from FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN where RELATE_ID in ( select RELATE_ID from FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN
BATCH_OID = #batchOid# group by RELATE_ID having count(*)>1)
BATCH_OID = #batchOid#
)
GROUP BY RELATE_ID, O180FILENAME, LINENUM having count(*)>1

select NAMES,O180FILENAME, LINENUM from ( select DISTINCT RELATE_ID||RTRIM(NAMES,' ') as SUMNAMES ,RTRIM(NAMES,' ') as NAMES, O180FILENAME, LINENUM from FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN where RTRIM(NAMES,' ') in ( select RTRIM(NAMES,' ') from FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN
BATCH_OID = #batchOid# group by RTRIM(NAMES,' ') having count(*)>1)
BATCH_OID = #batchOid#
)
GROUP BY NAMES, O180FILENAME, LINENUM having count(*)>1
sqlMap.delete: delete from FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN where BATCH_OID = #batchOid:DECIMAL# and O180FILENAME = #o180filename:VARCHAR# and LINENUM = #linenum:DECIMAL# and RELATION_AGENT = #relationAgent:VARCHAR# and SORT_NO = #sortNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN (BATCH_OID, O180FILENAME, LINENUM, RELATION_AGENT, SORT_NO, RELATE_ID, NAMES, IS_LEGAL, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, NATIONALITY, OCCUPATION, OCCUPATIONNAME, LISTED_COMPANY, ISSUE_SHARES, ICREATE, DCREATE ) values (#batchOid:DECIMAL#, #o180filename:VARCHAR#, #linenum:DECIMAL#, #relationAgent:VARCHAR#, #sortNo:VARCHAR#, #relateId:VARCHAR#, #names:OTHER#, #isLegal:VARCHAR#, #birthday:VARCHAR#, #phone:VARCHAR#, #nationality:VARCHAR#, #occupation:VARCHAR#, #occupationname:VARCHAR#, #listedCompany:VARCHAR#, #issueShares:VARCHAR#, #icreate:VARCHAR#, #dcreate:TIMESTAMP# )
sqlMap.update:
update FIR_CTBC_REW_SNN
RELATE_ID = #relateId:VARCHAR#
NAMES = #names:OTHER#
IS_LEGAL = #isLegal:VARCHAR#
BIRTHDAY = #birthday:VARCHAR#
PHONE = #phone:VARCHAR#
NATIONALITY = #nationality:VARCHAR#
OCCUPATION = #occupation:VARCHAR#
OCCUPATIONNAME = #occupationname:VARCHAR#
LISTED_COMPANY = #listedCompany:VARCHAR#
ISSUE_SHARES = #issueShares:VARCHAR#
ICREATE = #icreate:VARCHAR#
DCREATE = #dcreate:TIMESTAMP#
where BATCH_OID = #batchOid:DECIMAL# and O180FILENAME = #o180filename:VARCHAR# and LINENUM = #linenum:DECIMAL# and RELATION_AGENT = #relationAgent:VARCHAR# and SORT_NO = #sortNo:VARCHAR#
